quest.name: The Color of Joy
journal: Alphinaud has a mind to join the others at the High Crucible.
objectives: Speak with Krile at the Baldesion Annex.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Like his sister Tiamat, Vrtra is possessed of a gentle soul. I'm glad they're on our side.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The attendant was kind enough to give me directions to the High Crucible. First, let us return to the mulberry orchard.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I understand the mulberries are for the silkworms. Grown a stone's throw away from the satrap's residence... It gives it the quintessential Thavnairian flair, don't you think?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: From here, we're supposed to follow the path left and past the mulberries...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The word Yuj apparently means “bind” in the local tongue, and this district is so named because it connects all others in the city.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If we manage to come this far, we shouldn't have trouble finding the High Crucible─or so I was told.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Where the street turns, enter the door straight ahead then descend the steps...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I thought the Crystarium was confusing, but it doesn't compare to Radz–at–Han. The architecture and decorations make it even harder to get your bearings.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Anyway, let's see where this door takes us.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Whew, it seems we're on the right track.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: And here is the aetheryte plaza. So far so good, and there isn't much further to go.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: From here, we just need to cross to the other side of the hall, then pass through the larger of two doorways. The High Crucible lies beyond.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I suspect the others have already collected the warding scales. Come, let us join them.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: You took your time. Got turned around, I take it?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Though this land hath been afforded a respite, in turmoil do many others languish still. Our work is far from finished.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: What an immense laboratory... How many such places were enlisted to help forge the warding scales, I wonder.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Excellent. You're in time to hear the latest good news.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: The Students have previously turned to Radz–at–Han's alchemists for help with the analysis of various artifacts.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: That is how I became acquainted with Nidhana. I'm glad we could rescue her, and pray she makes a full recovery...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I'm quite well now, I assure you. As they say, the stronger the taste─and stranger the color─the more effective the remedy.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: With my body trying to replenish the aether I spent, however, I'm feeling rather famished...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I think a sampling of the local delicacies is in order. Hamsa cuisine would be a good place to start, perhaps?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: As I heard it, after you defeated Nidhogg, his scales found their way into the hands of the Firmament's artisans.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Steeped in power as they are, it's no surprise that they were coveted. Still, it is a strange legacy for the vengeful wyrm.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We're last, of course, but at least we found the place.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: The last thing I remember before being absorbed into the tower was you rushing towards me...

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: I can only imagine the hardships you and yours must have had to overcome to rescue us.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: No amount of words will suffice to express my gratitude, but I hope the flower's radiant glow says everything I cannot.

dialogue.name: OJIKATSUNJIKA
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: It's good to be back, and with the fruit of our labors safely in storage!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: For now, we have but to wait for the others to return from their respective meetings with the Alliance leaders.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: As Thancred suggested, you should get some rest in the meantime!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Your chamber is comfortable, I hope? If it's cold in there, just let me know─we have plenty of blankets to spare.

dialogue.name: OJIKATSUNJIKA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename! Krile has apprised me of your recent accomplishments. What an amazing feat to eliminate a tower, and pave the way to deal with the rest.

dialogue.name: OJIKATSUNJIKA
dialogue.text: While it isn't much, I've changed your sheets and plumped up your pillow. After all, there's nothing like collapsing in a nice clean bed after completing a major malmstone, be it penning a thesis or defeating deiform entities!

dialogue.name: OJIKATSUNJIKA
dialogue.text: So, would you like to take a look at your new and improved lodgings now?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Retire to your chamber?
